titles.title: HEADs UP Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act to expand and improve health care services by health centers and the National Health Service Corps for individuals with a developmental disability, and for other purposes.
HEADs UP Act
Healthcare Extension and Accessibility for Developmentally disabled and Underserved Population Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Healthcare Extension and Accessibility for Developmentally disabled and Underserved Population Act of 2018 or the HEADs UP Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to support health centers that provide services for individuals with developmental disabilities, including dental care.
